title: Sketchbook Folio, "Saint Sebastian, Detail of Polyptich with the Virgin Enthroned, Study after Dosso Dossi", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: St. Sebastian, tied to column, with shield and armor. On ground Saint Sebastian.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Saint Sebastian, Detail of Polyptich with the Virgin Enthroned, Study after Dosso Dossi", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3616.
